completeDialog.title: Complete Review
completeDialog.description: You are about to mark this transcript review as complete. Here's a summary of the review work.
completeDialog.noEdits: No edits have been made to this transcript yet. Are you sure you want to mark it as complete?

success.title: Review Completed
success.description: The review has been marked as complete.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to mark review as complete

manualTime.label: The calculated review time is not accurate
manualTime.help: This will be shown in reports for context, but won't replace the calculated time.

explanation.title: How we calculate review time
explanation.description: This is an approximation based on edit timestamps and the audio duration between edits. We detect review sessions by analyzing time gaps that exceed the expected review time, helping distinguish active work from pauses.

sessionBreakdown.timelineDescription: Showing all reviewers' sessions in chronological order

explanation.title: How we calculate review time
explanation.description: This is an approximation based on edit timestamps and the audio duration between edits. We detect review sessions by analyzing time gaps that exceed the expected review time, helping distinguish active work from pauses.
